summary: Gamers playing a MMORPG based on the "Hellraiser" films find their lives endangered after being invited to a rave, the host of which intends to show them the truth behind the Cenobite mythos.
cast: Stelian Urian|Katheryn Winnick|Anna Tolputt|Khary Payton|Henry Cavill|Christopher Jacot|Lance Henriksen|Doug Bradley|Magdalena Tun|Gavril Patrv|Desiree Malonga|Carl V. Dupré|Catalina Alexandru|Victor McGuire|Costi Mirica|Snowy Highfield|Mike J. Regan|David Robinson|Gary J. Tunnicliffe
keywords: pinhead character|psychotronic film|2000s|massively multiplayer online role playing game|role playing video game
title: Hellraiser: Hellworld
